title: Switzerland: The Alpine Wonderland
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Switzerland - Description and travel
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Alpine regions
description: Episode of Series "Video visits". Journey to spectacular Switzerland, famous for elegant timepieces, rich chocolate and breathtaking scenery. Start your tour in Zurich, the largest city, and continue on to tranquil Lucerne. Explore the Jungfrau and hear yodellers in the ski resort of Grindelwald. Admire the arcaded streets and clock towers of Bern, walk along the medieval ramparts at Morat, and drive to nearby Neuchatel, one of the country's watchmaking centres. Shop in elegant Lausanne, on Lake Geneva. Take the waters at Bad Ragaz and shiver in the dungeon of the Chateau de Chillon, made famous by Lord Byron. Visit the international city of Geneva before continuing on to the magnificent Matterhorn at Zermatt.
